description: This is a general template for a request-response interaction.  Specific fields will vary depending on the context.

request.description: Details of the request being made.

endpoint.description: The specific endpoint or resource being requested.

parameters.description: Any parameters or data associated with the request.

headers.description: HTTP headers for the request (if applicable).

body.description: The request body (if applicable, e.g., for POST/PUT requests).

status_code.description: HTTP status code of the response (if applicable).

status_message.description: HTTP status message of the response (if applicable).

headers.description: HTTP headers of the response (if applicable).

data.description: Structured data extracted from the response body (if applicable).

error.description: Error message if the request failed.

metadata.description: Additional metadata about the request-response interaction.

duration.description: Duration of the request-response cycle (in milliseconds).

correlation_id.description: A unique identifier linking the request and response.
